All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivityMainBinding
 
ActivityScoreBinding
 
ActivityTopPlayersBinding
 
fetchQuestion
An activity for displaying and answering a series of questions.
InputNameBinding
 
ItemTopicBinding
 
MainActivity
 
MyApplication
Custom Application class for initializing the ScoreDatabase instance.
Question
Represents a question in the quiz, including the question text, options, and correct answer.
QuestionLookBinding
 
Score
Represents a player's score and associated information in the app.
ScoreActivity
Activity for displaying the user's score and handling interactions related to the score.
ScoreDao
 
ScoreDatabase
Database class that defines the Room database for storing scores.
Topic
Represents a topic that can be displayed in the app.
TopicClickListener
Interface for handling clicks on topics.
TopicsAdapter
Adapter class for displaying a list of topics in a RecyclerView.
TopicSelection
Activity for selecting a topic and fetching questions related to the selected topic.
TopicSelectionBinding
 
TopPlayersActivity
Activity for displaying the top players' scores in a ListView.
